title: Can I get mechanical at pesu?
content: I got a 9300 rank in PESSAT 2023, as of now I have been told to wait for round two of counselling as round 1 caters for 1-8000 ranks. What are my chances of getting in ( I want to pursue bachelors mechanical engineering)

comments.body:
There is a chance , attend round two 
But have you considered other colleges through management quota? The fees is much lower for mechanical seats usually. (3.5L for bms college of engineering if I recall)
When management is lesser than pessat fee üíÄ
It's like a 10k difference but still less üëç
Lol if I recall in PES itself the difference between management and pessat fee for mechanical is around 50k~
Proud of you to pursue Mech ‚ù§Ô∏è

The core engineering branches are Mech, Elect, Civil.
A passionate student is one who takes one of these branch by choice, rather than being constrained by ranks.
Be rest assured that you will be flooded with jobs and research opportunities if you demonstrate passion to gain expertise in core engg. branches.
I am eligible for BMSCE as well through comedk, as of now I've kept it in my list along with MSRIT
